channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Tides Turn for Trump’s Maritime Industrial Policy
item.description: Instead of promoting the maritime industry, government interventions cripple it.

item.title: After Spreading Russia Hoax Lies, Media Lie Again To Bury Evidence They Lied
item.description: The reason the propaganda press is clinging to this "eight-year-old assessment" is simple: they sold it to the American public as fact.

item.title: Appeals Court rules Trump's birthright citizenship order violates Constitution
item.description: President Trump's attempt to block the U.S. from recognizing birthright citizenship for children born to illegal immigrants runs afoul of the Constitu...

item.title: How Reddit Destroyed Mainstream American Culture
item.description: All mainstream culture is now created by and for resentful geek losers. Everything sucks now, and it’s because of Reddit.

item.title: Republicans Fumbled the Ball on Social Security
item.description: They had a chance to institute private accounts 20 years ago but allowed Democrats’ scare tactics to kill the idea. That failure cost us all dearly.

item.title: Hong Kong Authorities Are Hiding the Truth About Jimmy Lai
item.description: It will come as no surprise to those who are familiar with Xi Jinping’s rule that Lai is enduring inhumane treatment.

item.title: There Are Three Good Reasons To Cut Bureaucratic Bloat, And Only One Is About Money
item.description: The real goal of DOGE is the return the government to the limited, constitutional order envisioned by the founders.

item.title: Trump says U.S. will win the race on artificial intelligence
item.description: The White House unveiled a collection of initiatives that aim to make the U.S. the world leader of artificial intelligence.

item.title: House GOP moves to establish new panel to probe Jan. 6
item.description: House Republicans introduced a resolution establishing a new select subcommittee to continue the investigation of the events surrounding the Jan. 6, 2...

item.title: Latest Unsealed Docs Expose Obama, Hillary, And The Russia Lie
item.description: The declassified House Intelligence Committee report found the Kremlin had lots of dirt on Clinton it could have used, but didn't.

item.title: The End of the Essay? Humanities Departments Enter the AI Age
item.description: At a higher level, students must be convinced of the importance of thinking.

item.title: What The Sports Media Don’t Understand About Scottie Scheffler’s All-Consuming Faith
item.description: Scheffler doesn't play for others or even for his family. He plays for the greater glory of God, whom he entirely credits for his success.

item.title: Bondi facing Democratic calls to testify following report she told Trump he was in Epstein files
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi is facing Democratic calls to testify before Congress following a newspaper's revelation that she told President Donald Tru...

item.title: Russiagate, Revisited
item.description: Trump was the victim of an iniquitous dirty trick in 2016, but Gabbard has presented nothing new about Obama’s involvement.

item.title: NYC Mayor Adams dings Cuomo over 'history of sabotaging Black electeds'
item.description: Mayor Eric Adams is playing the race card against former Gov. Andrew Cuomo in the New York mayoral race.
